titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend by 2 years the energy efficient commercial buildings deduction.
CLEANER Buildings Act
CLEANER Buildings Act
Commercial, Low Emissions And Net Energy Reduction Buildings Act
Commercial, Low Emissions And Net Energy Reduction Buildings Act
Commercial, Low Emissions And Net Energy Reduction Buildings Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Commercial, Low Emissions And Net Energy Reduction Buildings Act or the CLEANER Buildings Act
This bill extends the tax deduction for energy efficient commercial buildings through December 31, 2019. (Under current law, the deduction expired after December 31, 2017.)
